dimensions:

B. Warp: 225.5 cm (88 1/2 in.); Weft: (selvage to selvage) 85 cm (33 3/8 in.)

medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave.
description: Ogival center line patter in red on white. Two blocks were needed to print the pattern. The size of each block was 33 cm high by 21.5 cm wide.
name: Textile
